casebody.data:
Steven K. STANLEY
v.
Carl E. TAYLOR et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 13, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn.App. 901, 181 A.3d 613 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
